# Issue Backlog Summary

Last updated: 2024

## Overview

This document summarizes the issue backlog for Tario development.

## Issue Categories

### Bugs
No known bugs at this time.

### Enhancements
Priority enhancements from the roadmap:
- Multiple levels support
- Enemy system
- Power-up system

### Documentation
- Expand inline code comments
- Add more tutorials

### Good First Issues
Issues suitable for new contributors:
- Add new tile types
- Create additional level designs
- Improve HUD display
- Add terminal size detection

## Priority Matrix

| Priority | Category | Description |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| High | Feature | Level file loading |
| High | Feature | Level selection menu |
| Medium | Feature | Basic enemies |
| Medium | Quality | Pause menu |
| Low | Feature | Power-ups |
| Low | Feature | Level editor |

## Sprint-Ready Issues

Issues ready for immediate work:
1. Implement level file format parser
2. Add level selection screen
3. Create 2-3 additional levels
4. Improve terminal size handling

## Backlog Grooming

This document should be updated when:
- New issues are created
- Issues are completed
- Priorities change
- Planning sessions occur
